title: Lost Faith
author: HylandMoon
content:
“They have no authority
They roam free
They join the majority
They could always foresee
They have lost faith
---
They will betray 
They welcome change
They use hexeri
They estrange
They have lost faith
---
They make things go awry
They were easily swayed
They never gratify
They are a renegade
They have lost faith”
